trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SEQ_00<tab>Concern is writ plain upon Vuyargur's face.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy supply runner at Icuvlo's Inn.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_UYARGUR_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have a favor to ask of you. I had sent someone to Icuvlo's Inn to replenish our larder, but she is rather late to return.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_UYARGUR_000_002<tab>I fear she may have encountered some manner of trouble on the road. I would be grateful if you could search for her.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_005<tab>Oh dear, Vuyargur asked you to find me? I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to make him worry.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_006<tab>I'd heard that a feast was to be held for the snow spirits, you see, and I wanted to serve up something that they might enjoy with the kirkahryar.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_007<tab>But I couldn't think of anything, and the time got away... Would you happen to have any ideas?

TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_008<tab>I wanted to provide a treat for the spirits again─something different and new. But I couldn't think of anything, and the time got away... Would you happen to have any ideas?
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_A1_000_001<tab>How about another variety of liquor?
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_A1_000_002<tab>How about sweets prepared with ice?
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_A1_000_003<tab>There's no knowing the spirits' tastes.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_009<tab>Ah, so something that offers contrast. In which case, the Pelupelu's mezcal may be suitable.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_010<tab>The taste is rather different from kirkahryar, but perhaps some snow spirits will enjoy it.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_011<tab>Ah, of course, it stands to reason that snow spirits would prefer cold things.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_012<tab>In which case, perhaps I could freeze some flowers and fruits in a bed of ice. That would be both pretty and palatable, I daresay.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_013<tab>It's true, there's still much that we don't know about the spirits... That's why I spent so much time pondering it to no avail.

TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_014<tab>Perhaps by simply enjoying the occasion ourselves, we would make it more enjoyable for them. In which case, something that we ourselves like would be suitable.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_015<tab>Yes, the more I think on it, the more I feel confident in that approach. It will make for a wonderful banquet, I'm sure of it!
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_016<tab>I'm much obliged for your guidance. Please assure Vuyargur that I'll be back as soon as I have what I need.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_SHOPPINGYOK05363_000_017<tab>My thanks again for your guidance, and please assure Vuyargur that I'll be back as soon as I have what I need.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_UYARGUR_000_020<tab>Were you able to find the supply runner?
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_UYARGUR_000_021<tab>So that is the way of it... I'm glad to hear that she was safe.
TEXT_BANYOK128_05363_UYARGUR_000_022<tab>And thanks to your sage counsel, she was able to arrive at an answer to her dilemma. I shall look forward to seeing what she acquires for the snow spirits.
